description: The current published state of all editions of a content item as well as any scheduled publishing information. Machine-generated.
title: Publishing Information

$eref.description: A grab-bag object for non-validatable data.
$eref.title: Has additional properties

___edition_revision_id.description: The id of the revision that this edition was created from. Omitted if unpublished.
___edition_revision_id.title: Revision ID

___edition_name.description: The machine-readable identifier of this edition. This should be the same as the key in 'editions' for the edition object.
___edition_name.title: Edition Name

___edition_publish_date.description: The machine-editable date that should be shown to readers as the 'publish date' for this content item. When viewing the story at this edition name directly, this will override whatever value is set for Publish Date on the story directly. Every time an edition is updated (i.e. a story is republished) this date will also be updated unless otherwise specified.
___edition_publish_date.title: Publish Date (Edition)

___edition_published.description: If false, this edition has been deleted/unpublished.
___edition_published.title: Publish Status

___edition_first_publish_date.description: The machine-generated date that this edition was created for the first time (i.e., that the content item was first published.)
___edition_first_publish_date.title: First Published Date (Edition)

___edition_date.description: The machine-generated date that this edition was last updated (i.e., that the content item was published/unpublished to a particular destination.)
___edition_date.title: Edition Date

___edition_display_date.description: The human-editable date that should be shown to readers as the 'date' for this content item. When viewing the story at this edition name directly, this will override whatever value is set for Display Date on the story directly. After an edition is created, subsequent updates to that edition will not change this date unless otherwise specified.
___edition_display_date.title: Display Date (Edition)

___edition_date.description: The machine-generated date that this edition was last updated (i.e., that the content item was published/unpublished to a particular destination.)

___editions.description: A map of edition names to the current publish state for that edition

___scheduled_operations.description: A map of lists of operations scheduled to be performed on this content item, sorted by operation type.
___scheduled_operations.title: Scheduled Operations

$eref.description: A grab-bag object for non-validatable data.
$eref.title: Has additional properties

___operation_date.description: The date that this operation will be performed.
___operation_date.title: Operation Date

___operation_edition.description: The name of the edition this operation will publish to.
___operation_edition.title: Edition Name (Operation)

$eref.description: A grab-bag object for non-validatable data.

___operation_date.description: The date that this operation will be performed.

___operation_edition.description: The name of the edition this operation will publish to.

___operation_revision_id.description: The revision id to be published.
___operation_revision_id.title: Revision ID (Operation)
